title: Release
description: A release is a digital construction of a pinball game.

id.description: Unique identifier for a release. Gets generated automatically on creation.

description.description: A short description of the release. Will be Markdown formatted.

changes.description: Changelog. A list of changes for this version.

flavor.title: Flavor
flavor.description: Defines the flavor of the file.

orientation.description:
Table orientation. Values:

* `ws` - Widescreen, for playing on desktop PCs.
* `fs` - Fullscreen or portrait, used on cabinets.

lightning.description:
Playfield illumination. Values:

* `day` - Illuminated playfield.
* `night` - Dark playfield.

_compatibility.description: Reference to one or more compatible builds.

_media.title: Media References
_media.description: References to media related to the file.

authors.description: One or more authors of this release.

roles.description: One or more roles of the user.

_tags.description: None, one or multiple reference to tags.

links.description: A list of links related to this release.

label.description: A short label describing the link

acknowledgements.description: Free text describing people who helped creating this release but are not considered as authors.

original_version.title: Original Release
original_version.description:
In case of a mod, this refers to the original version of the release (i.e. the "modded release").

It can either be a direct link within VPDB, or a label and URL to an external resource.

_ref.description: Reference to the original version within VPDB.

release.title: External Release Resource
release.description: In case the modded release is not on VPDB, this links to an external resource.

url.description: URL when the modded release can be found.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the release was added to the database.

_created_by.description: Reference to the user who created this release. Only visible by contributors and above.
